description:
This packer plugin leverages VMware OVF Tool to create a vagrant-vcloud and vagrant-vcenter compatible boxes.

This plugin is used to build the boxes available at https://vagrantcloud.com/gosddc you can find the packer templates at https://github.com/gosddc/packer-templates
summary: This packer plugin leverages VMware OVF Tool to create a vagrant-vcloud and vagrant-vcenter compatible boxes.
author: Fabio Rapposelli,  Stefan Scherer
